pages.text: Circles suck. So much so that it's typically easier to use a tool to help build them. That's where the $(item)Worldshaper's Sextant$() comes in. Look at the block you wish to be the centre, then, while holding Right-Click, look out toward where you wish the edge to be. When you release Right-Click, it will project an image to help you build your circle.
Requires a source of $(thing)Mana$() in your inventory, such as a $(item)Mana Tablet$().
